page.title: 04Living in Frogmore in 1985.
page.content: I like Frogmore because you can go for walks along the fields and estuary. Frogmore has got a village shop which has got things for your house and sweets for the children. There is also a post office in the shop. The shop sells crisps and it has bread and cakes which are baked in the shop's back room. I like the shop because it has nice smells and there are all sorts of things which are interesting. Outside there is a bus stop and people who cannot drive take the buses. These are some of the places the buses go to, Chillington, Dartmouth, Slapton and Kingsbridge. Buses come in different kinds, some are double deckers and some are like coaches. All the buses are nice to sit in. They all have side seats and I like them best because I can see all around.
